segments.text: William , do you like studying English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like studying English , and I can read well , but speaking can be difficult .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not that bad . If you talk to your American friends every day , you'll learn quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I ask you a question ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , what do you want to know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have my book from class here . How do you say this word ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I don't understand . What does that mean ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A laptop is a type of computer that you can carry with you . Do you understand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so . Can you say it again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Laptop . Did I pronounce that correctly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's right . That's very good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . And this word ? How do you pronounce this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks so much . You're a good teacher .
segments.speaker: S2
